lead_paragraph: The Chicago Bulls agreed yesterday to send center Tyson Chandler to the New Orleans Hornets for the veteran forward P. J. Brown and the swingman J. R. Smith, The Chicago Tribune reported on its Web site. Officials with both the Bulls and the Hornets declined comment. The deal cannot become official until July 12, when the N.B.A.'s free-agent signing moratorium ends.
